name: Syntropy
intro: Providing next-generation connectivity technology for the Internet
introduce: Syntropy is establishing an open alternative data security and routing system, operating right on top of the existing Internet protocols. Syntropy aims to transform the public internet into a secure and user-centric internet through a unifying layer where encryption and optimized performance are built-in and automatically enabled for anything and everything connected to it. Syntropy is designed to solve issues prevalent in the current Internet framework, including security, privacy, governance, performance, reliability, and ineffective resource utilization.
